text: Nangni'n phur ningmanuom, takkha nangni'n neimakchu, khawa jarra nangni mikathat sik-ah ning-insuuk; nangni'n phur khat ningmanuomhek, takkha nangni'n neimator makchu, khawa jarra nangni'n ning-insuol khat-um ning-inseii. Nangni'n ningmanuom kha neimakchu ajarchu nangni'n khawa sik-ah Pathian diang nimakchu.
